post:
We are giving away a total of 7 free Medium VPS in Dallas. The host specs are beastly running on Dual Intel Xeon Gold 6128 and a 10gbps uplink port.
The winners will either get a HDD or NVME version with spec's:

70GB HDD or 70GB NVMe SSD
1GB RAM
2GB Swap RAM
2vCores
1TB Bandwidth
10gbps Network Connection
1 IPv4
1 /64 IPv6

The winner will be drawn at the end of each business day from a pool of all purchases made that same day and will be notified via ticket. We request that winners also provide their facebook or twitter account details so we may announce their winning's publicly also.
The prizes will be free for 3 months after which it can be renewed at 35% off regular price recurring for the life of the plan.

Our new storage plans located in USA have a huge 50% off this BF.

We have too many exclusive Black friday plans to list here so visit our promotion website and view our offers yourself.

Our VPS service is available in 8 locations, UK, France, Germany, Finland, Canada, USA, Singapore and Australia.
Use code "STORE50BF"
